text.1: Are you sure you want to remove the account "{{accountName}}" from Solar? You can still use it elsewhere if you save the private key.
text.2: Make sure to backup your private key or merge the funds into another account of yours, since there are still funds left!

cannot-merge.text: Cannot merge account yet. First you need to cancel all open trading orders and remove all assets.
cannot-merge.title: Manual action required

limit.label: Limit (optional)
limit.placeholder: Limit trust in this asset / maximum balance to hold

backup.title: Back up your secret key now
backup.paragraph-1: The secret key backup is the only way to recover your funds if you forget your password or cannot access your device anymore.
backup.paragraph-2: Write down the key or print it. Keep it in a safe place and do not share it with anyone.

export.paragraph-1: The secret key backup is the only way to recover your funds if you forget your password or cannot access your device anymore.
export.paragraph-2: Write down the key or print it. Keep it in a safe place and do not share it with anyone.

info.secret-key: Write down the key on paper and store it in a safe place.

preset-description.m-out-of-n: Add or remove signers from the account. Any single signature will authorize transactions.
preset-description.m-out-of-n_plural: Add or remove signers from the account. {{ count }} signatures will authorize transactions.
preset-description.one-out-of-n: Add or remove signers from the account. Any single signer can authorize transactions.
preset-description.single-signature: Choose the key that should be the account's single signer.

preset-description-extra.m-out-of-n: Go to 'Add Account' > 'Join Account' in the co-signing Solar wallet to create a new co-signer's key.
preset-description-extra.one-out-of-n: Go to 'Add Account' > 'Join Account' in the co-signing Solar wallet to create a new co-signer's key.

m-out-of-n.secondary: Multiple signers have to sign a transaction.

one-out-of-n.secondary: Every signer can sign transactions by themself.

single-signature.secondary: No co-signers. Just one key pair.

preset-selector.title: Choose how your account should work

threshold.secondary: No. of signatures to authorize transactions

validation.invalid-stellar-address: Expected a public key or stellar address.

validation.no-signers: No signers left. Don't lock yourself out!
validation.threshold-higher-than-weights: Threshold higher than combined key weights

validation.next-password-missing: Enter a password or set "remove password".

secondary.long: Make account multi-signature and manage co-signers

secondary.account-protected: Your account is secure, protected by a password
